name: Asteris
ldesc: Asteris writes software that makes it easy for companies to implement continuous delivery and realtime data pipelines. We support the HashiCorp stack, along with Kubernetes, Apache Mesos, Spark and Kafka. We're core committers on mantl.io, consul-cli and mesos-consul.

name: Cheval Partners
ldesc: Cheval Partners is a networks of experts specializing in Cloud, IoT, DevOps, Innovation and Business Strategy.

name: CreationLine
ldesc: We are a global system integrator specialized in Open Source solutions. Based in Tokyo, Japan, we provide DevOps, Big Data and cloud infrastructure solutions to large enterprise companies.

name: MustWin
ldesc: Must Win is a full-service software solutions provider based in the heart of Silicon Valley. We work on technical challenges ranging from optimizing hardware utilization, security compliance, instituting dev/ops automation and developing entirely new lines of business from concept to launch.

name: Opex Software
ldesc: Opex Software caters to a market of DevOps and clean cloud solution integrations. All Opex engagements focus on improving one key metric - speed. We pack tremendous speed into IT operations with automation.

name: REAN
tagline: REAN Cloud, an AWS Advanced Consulting Partner, is a one-stop shop for all of your cloud services needs.
ldesc: From figuring it out to getting it done, REAN Cloud is your full-service Cloud IT solutions provider. REAN Cloud, an Advanced AWS Consulting Partner, is a cloud-native firm with deep experience supporting enterprise IT infrastructures and DevOps continuous integration and continuous delivery implementations.

name: Xebia
ldesc: Xebia is a specialized, international IT consultancy, training and project company. We employ over 550 experts worldwide, who are up-to-date on the latest technologies in agile development, continuous delivery, architecture, and datacenter automation.
